======================================================================
ASN.1 Parser Implementation Summary
======================================================================

Implementation: step1.py
Input: asn1/nr-rrc-17.3.0.asn1
Output: cache/asn1_types.json

======================================================================
Features Implemented
======================================================================

✅ Name normalization (remove '-', convert to PascalCase)
✅ SEQUENCE parsing with multiple fields
✅ SEQUENCE OF with SIZE constraints
✅ CHOICE types with alternatives
✅ ENUMERATED types with values
✅ INTEGER with range constraints
✅ OCTET STRING and OCTETSTRING
✅ OCTET STRING (CONTAINING Type)
✅ SetupRelease pattern detection
✅ Optional field detection (OPTIONAL keyword)
✅ Extension marker detection (...)
✅ Inline nested SEQUENCE/CHOICE extraction
✅ Inline ENUMERATED extraction
✅ Nested type tracking with parent references
✅ Constraint extraction (lb/ub)
✅ Comment preservation
✅ Balanced brace matching for nested structures

======================================================================
Parsing Results
======================================================================

Total types parsed: 3122

Breakdown by kind:
  • BOOLEAN.......................     1
  • CHOICE........................   215
  • ENUMERATED....................   892
  • INTEGER.......................   189
  • OCTET_STRING..................     9
  • SEQUENCE......................  1214
  • SEQUENCE_OF...................   580
  • TYPE_REFERENCE................    22

Additional statistics:
  • Nested types (with parent)...  1069
  • Types with extension marker..   415
  • Types with constraints.......   772

======================================================================
Example Parsed Types
======================================================================

1. SEQUENCE with Optional Fields:
----------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: LocationMeasurementIndicationIEs
Kind: SEQUENCE
Fields:
  • MeasurementIndication: SetupRelease of LocationMeasurementInfo
  • LateNonCriticalExtension: OctetString [OPTIONAL]
  • NonCriticalExtension: LocationMeasurementIndication-IEsNoncriticalextension [OPTIONAL]

2. SetupRelease Pattern:
----------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: LocationMeasurementIndicationIEs
Field: MeasurementIndication
Type: SetupRelease of LocationMeasurementInfo

3. SEQUENCE OF with Constraints:
----------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: DRBCountMSBInfoList
Kind: SEQUENCE_OF
Element Type: DRBCountMSBInfo
Constraints: {'lb': 1, 'ub': 'maxDRB'}

4. ENUMERATED Type:
----------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: SIBReqInfoR16
Values: Sib12, Sib13, Sib14, Sib20V1700, Sib21V1700
  ... and 3 more
